summary: REQ-29 and REQ-30 appear implemented: logout now clears identity, clears React Query cache, and navigates to '/' with replace; authenticated layout redirects to '/' when identity is undefined and initialization is not in progress. However, the diff also includes unrelated documentation-like changes claiming additional route/UI work not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/summary claims a new deep-link-only authenticated route '/closest-connections' was added in App.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to add new routes or change existing route paths; diff evidence only shows this claim inside a summary file, not as a requested change.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/summary includes multiple unrelated UI/feature changes (LoginPanel copy changes, ProfileGate recovery actions, BottomNav redesign, various page content changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to logout redirect + authenticated-route guard; these additional changes are not requested and are only evidenced by the modified summary file.
